module.name: derived_shape_element
module.purpose: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of shape elements that are derived from other shape elements.

inscope.li: Shape elements that derives from one or more other shape elements;
Constructive geometry that derives from one or more shape elements.

uof.name: Derived_Shape_Element
uof.description: The Derived_Shape_Element UoF specifies the data structure for the representation of a shape element that is derived from one or more other shape elements.

alt_map.description: If the derivation is not represented with a specific subtype
If the derivation is represented with a specific subtype
If the derivation is not represented with a specific subtype
If the derivation is represented with a specific subtype
